textfields.tf: To address the driving level using the diagnostic software
To address the driving level using the remote-control unit
To store the actual count value as driving level
Please mark the only of the following steps, which is never performed during calibration of the height sensors.
No, this step is performed. During calibration of the height sensors the driving level is usually first addressed.
During calibration the remote-control unit is deactivated.

No, this step is performed. During calibration of the height sensors the driving level specified by the vehicle manufacturer is addressed and the resulting count values are stored as driving level in the ECU.
No, during calibration of the height sensors the upper and the lower level are usually addressed.
Correct, during calibration the remote-control unit is deactivated, when the diagnosis mode is started in the software.
